doc:
Hal Stalmaster https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hal_Stalmaster 0 Harry Lapidus Stalmaster, known as Hal Stalmaster (born March 29, 1940), is an American former actor, known for his lead role in the 1957 Walt Disney film of the American Revolution Johnny Tremain, based on the 1943 Esther Forbes novel of the same name. Harry_Lapidus_Stalmaster , known as Hal_Stalmaster ( born March_29_,_1940 ) , is an_American_former_actor , known for his_lead_role in the_1957_Walt_Disney_film of the_American_Revolution_Johnny_Tremain , based on the_1943_Esther_Forbes_novel of the_same_name .
